name: Cupid Simulator: Humans Story (spin-off)
description:
Cupid Simulator: Humans Story is a small visual novel / RPG game spin-off of the Cupid Simulator game, currently under development.

The cupid Aelia has a mission: make the human Daniel get a girlfriend in 14 days.

If you like these characters, please join our community to get the latest news on Cupid Simulator :)

          

Thanks for playing this experience and hope you like it! Also, please share any feedback in how we could improve it! 😊 A big hug from everybody at Supernova Games.
